document.full_text: the n.b.a. has fined kobe bryant of the los angeles lakers $100,000 for directing an anti-gay slur at a referee during tuesday's victory over the san antonio spurs.
document.title: n.b.a. fines kobe bryant $100,000 for directing gay slur at referee
lines_and_colors: the n.b.a. has fined kobe bryant of the los angeles lakers $100,000 for directing an anti-gay slur at a referee during tuesday's victory over the san antonio spurs.
